#include<iostream>
# define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ll t,n,diag,sum,prev_sum,temp;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        diag=0;
        sum=0;
        while(n>sum)
        {
            diag++;
            prev_sum=sum;
            sum+=diag;
        }
         temp=n-prev_sum;
        if(diag%2==0)
            cout<<"("<<temp<<","<<(++diag)-temp<<")"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"("<<(++diag)-temp<<","<<temp<<")"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
